name: wikiviewer
description: A remake of my Wikipedia viewer project for fCC

scripts.build:vendor: uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.js -o dist/scripts/bundle.js && css-bundler node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bundle.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css.map dist/css/bootstrap.min.css.map
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run setupfolder && npm run build:vendor && npm run build:html && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles
scripts.start: npm run build && run-p watch:* server

author: Greg Smith
